attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He knowingly disseminated fixed intelligence, he lied to Cabinet, Parliament and people about when he agreed with the US to go to war and the the reasons for it, he betrayed his country to a foreign power (the United States of America): he is a liar, a war criminal and a traitor with the blood of 650,000 Iraqi civilians on his hands and is unfit to remain as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.
